description:
Nothing is worn more 24/7 than your favorite tee. Created to bring all the natural comfort you love and the technical performance you demand, the Captive is your everyday, everything tee. Combining soft, durable organically grown cotton with the performance of polyester, the Captive feels great, stays cool, and dries fast. The trim fit streamlines the look and makes layering easy, and gusseted underarms and light stretch give you freedom to move.

Updated fabric made with organically grown cotton.
name: Arcteryx Captive T-Shirt - Mens
